title: Clear Passage
story: The morning light banishes the shadows, granting clarity of mind and revealing easier passages through the castle's labyrinthine halls.
effect: At the moment this card becomes active, all heroes immediately gain 1 Sanity. For the duration of this Day phase, movement through any Stairwell (Catacombs, First-Floor, Second-Floor, Third-Floor, Fourth-Floor) counts as only 1 step instead of 2. However, if any hero ends their movement in the Crypt or Dungeon, they must immediately lose 1 Health.
